short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hold, Book and Manage Events With Ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FIRST-HOLD is upgrading the venue selection experience for everyone: professional planners, caterers, and venue managers.  FIRST-HOLD is an event venue sourcing marketplace designed to save hours of time for planners and venues by showing live availability and allowing planners to discover and instantly place holds on unique professional event venues that fit their event size, style, and budget.

 
Features:
Live Calendar Availability
Google Calendar Integration
Chrome Extension for planners and venues
Integration with multiple industry partners
Ability to place a hold on a preferred date
Planners and venues communicate directly
